0.name: Kolkata TV
0.description: Latest News Headlines, Bengali News, Kolkata News, latest Bengali News, Top 10 News Today, Breaking News from Kolkata, India and World on Kolkata TV. Watch Latest Photos, Videos from Bollywood, Election News Updates and Kolkata TV News LIVE TV here.

1.name: ABP Ananda
1.description: ABP Ananda LIVE TV:  Latest Bengali news on ABP Ananda. Follow Ghanta Khanek Sange Suman and your favorite show live. Catch Cricket World Cup 2023, TET Protest,  Panchayat Elections 2023 and others with এবিপি আনন্দ লাইভ টিভি. Bangla News 24x7 | Latest Bangla News, Bengali Breaking News | দেখুন লাইভ টিভি - এবিপি আনন্দ | Bangla News LIVE TV 24x7

2.name: TV9 Bangla

3.name: News18 বাংলা
3.description: News18 বাংলা - Get all breaking and latest news in Bangla on News18 Bengali. Read Bangla khobor (বাংলা খবর) on Sports, Cricket, Lifestyle, entertainment and more.

4.name: Zee 24 Ghanta
4.description: Watch 24 Ghanta live bangla khobor on Zee News Bengali. Stay updated on breaking bangla khobor online, Kolkata news, exclusive news updates only on Zee 24 Ghata.
